attributes.additional_details:
To create a Minister for Men in response to the creation of the Minister for Women.

He will be appointed to positively promote males in society  from fathers, grandfathers, sons, brothers, sport stars and celebrities etc and to highlight the invaluable contribution to that society and nation they make. Also to ensure that men are not ridiculed, abused, exploited or discriminated against.

Politicians have a duty to represent ALL members of society and therefore need to address this inequality if it is itself to be seen as fair, sympathetic and impartial.  WE ALL HAVE FATHERS AND MEN HAVE FEELINGS AND RIGHTS TOO.
